Founded in 1998 by eminent Industrialists and some benign NRIs, Indo French Educational Trust (IFET) is committed to promote education and research in the field of Engineering and Technology and to collate and disseminate in such fields with effective ideas, methods and techniques.

patterns: tell me about the hostel facilities
responses: In hostel, there are more facilities are available like RO plant, indoor and outdoor games, Good and Healthy food, Gym facilities and much more facilities are available.

patterns: is the hostel food is good
responses: The food prepared in hostel is very hygine and tasty too. In two days per week, non veg dishes are available.

patterns: tell me about the computer science department
responses: The department has progressed with a vision and strong commitment in developing uncompromising standard for excellence,providing the state of art computing facilities and training to students. The department has well equipped computing laboratories and a rich repository of software covering a wide spectrum of applications.

patterns: tell me about some mechanical department
responses: A study of Mechanical Engineering imbibes the student with knowledge in modern methods of design, production, analysis, quality control, optimization and management of resources.

patterns: tell me about a EEE depatment
responses: Electrical and Electronic Engineering is an exciting and dynamic field. EEE is a subject that naturally partners with other disciplines to open the whole new engineering avenues.

patterns: tell me about the ece department
tell me about the electronics and communication engineering
responses: It is bestowed with an experienced team of faculty members with excellent academic records and proficiency. Excellent infrastructure, state-of-the-art computer centre with the latest advances in technology and comprehensive study material make the department a class apart.

patterns: tell me about some civil department
responses: The department has well experienced and committed faculty having members specialization in different areas of Civil Engineering. The faculty always work towards the development and progress of the department by upgrading and modernizing the laboratory facilities, organizing seminars and conferences.

patterns: tell me about the artificial intelligence and data science
tell me about the IT department
tell me about the information technology department
responses: The foremost objective of the department is to hone technical skills demanded by today's engineering professionals by providing a sound technical platform and the required . It prepares them to meet the challenges faced by today's IT professionals by exposing them to a wide array of cutting-edge technologies.
